name: Brown Rice Belgian Endive Salad
author: kekadu
summary: Need a healthy snack or lunch that will keep you full? Belgian endive and brown rice make for a refreshing lunch. For more than one serving, just multiply. This recipe would be great for summer or fall picnics, too! Add finely chopped fruit such as oranges or apples.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring the brown rice and water to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low; cover the saucepan and simmer until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, 45 to 50 minutes
Place the rice, endive, and red onion in a large bowl
Drizzle the balsamic vinegar and olive oil on top, and season with salt and pepper
